mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Dickey, John H. to Pierpont, Francis Harrison
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dickey, John H.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling May 14 1862. By Telegraph from Parkersburg 14 1862. General Kelly wishes me to telegraph You he has found no enemy at Burning Springs reported at Big Bend he intended to move in them yesterday by different routes. No damage done at Burning Springs but burning of govt barracks. he is of the opinion there is no other force in that region but the refugees from that place and [page 2] have returned under orders of Letcher to commence guerilla warfare Jno H Dickey Capt Comdg Post 67W211Coll
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Dickey, John H.
Parkersburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
